features: [Creative Building] Build your own botw guardian stalker and korok with 379 pieces building blocks. Recreate the iconic enemies or friends of the great Hyrule.
[Actionable Model] Features 360 degrees rotatable head and actionable legs. The legs are fully flexible and the head can spin just like it in the video game.
[Fun Toy and Great Decoration] It can be moved from the table for play or left on it as a really cool decoration for a desk or other display area. Would be a fun toy and look cool on a shelf.
[Great Gifts for Fans or Kids] Fantastic building toys and decorations for fans. A great Birthday/ Christmas gift as well. Perfect present for anyone who loves the game.
[Premium Quality] Built with 379 high quality ABS pieces. Easy to follow and build. Safe and environmentally friendly. Compatible with all major building block brands.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Guardian Stalker Build your own guardian stalker and korok with 379 high-quality pieces. Recreate the iconic enemies or friends of the great Hyrule. Model features 360° rotating head and fully flexible legs!

Great gifts for anyone who loves the game Guardians roam the peaks and valleys of Hyrule. It's your job to destroy them! Fantastic building toys and decorations for kids or adults. It can keep your child away from screens and improve their concentration. A unique game collectibles and decorations for adults as well.
Glowing Master Sword Korok Yahaha Hestu Korok Yahaha Master Sword Link Battle Soldiers Army Pieces 327 246 521 388 334 537

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun build, good quality parts, everything there
reviews.reviewText: I bought this having no idea if it would be any good. It's a no name product, from a company I don't know anything about. I rolled the dice anyway.As it turns out, the instructions were done in a Lego style, and were pretty good. They put more steps on one page, but they're clear and easy to follow. All the pieces were there, with a few extra of small parts, just like Lego. You can tell the pieces aren't Lego pieces, but they're still quite good. They fit together fine, even if the fit isn't quite as tight.For the price, I can't complain. This is a solid set. It was a fun one sitting build, and the design is really good, with articulated legs and a head that rotates. Was very much worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic quality and my kid loves it
reviews.reviewText: My 5-year-old kid is obsessed with guardian stalkers from Breath of the Wild. He loves Legos and wanted this. I was worried that since it isn't made by Lego, the bricks would be bad quality, but I couldn't be any more wrong. I was blown away by the quality of this product. Everything fit together well and it just looks so cool. I'm in my 30s, and I kind of want one for myself now.One thing to be aware of is that since it has so many articulating parts, and it has to stand on its legs, that it can be fragile if you actually try and play with it. It will be just fine if you put it on a shelf somewhere and look at it. My son wanted badly to play with it, and the armor on the legs and parts of the head were always falling off. I ended up using super glue on the more troublesome parts. I know this is very frowned upon, but it was either super glue it or deal with hourly tantrums from my child.Overall fantastic purchase, just be aware that you will need to glue it if you are making the purchase for a young child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun build, good for display!
reviews.reviewText: Thought I'd give this clone brand a go. Surpassed my expectations. Legs are super stable and there's plenty of articulation for a small build.Though not perfect. The Korok... well he's quite pathetic TBH. Lots of one dot bindings and the piece that holds the leaf on the front... it wants to pop off. Design & parts was great until I got to that little dude.Lego comparison (lego sets the bar @ 10 on everything EXCEPT PRICE!)Color consistency = 10 😳Material quality = 7Mold quality/consistency = 9Kit design = guardian 10 / korok 4Articulation = 10Price per piece value = 7Packaging = 7Instruction manual quality = 9Ease of Instructions = 8Missing pieces = NoExtra pieces = 14Fun factor = 8Lots of repetitive build sequences = yesWow factor = 9OVERALL VALUE = 8Would I recommend this kit as a lego alternative?Yes as long as it's below 7 cents/pc & lego has no comparable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Its Probably the best version of a Guardian on sale from a 3rd Party
reviews.reviewText: This set was just a dream to build, it looks amazing when done and compared to other interations of guardians available, it the better choice for the money. Everything snapped together like I was building something put out from Lego and although the instructions were a little jumbled, it was fairly easy to navigate from step to step and figure out what needed to be snapped on nextIt's a 3rd party set so some deviations in quality are to be expected but it came with a ton of extra pieces so I wasn't too upset about having to replace that 1 heat warped brick out with a real lego since everything else was good.I'd reccomend this product for any avid Zelda fan or kid looking to have a great looking menacing robot to display or play with

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a Zelda fan
reviews.reviewText: My son loved this, although it’s not sturdy enough to play with. The top section comes off easily, but perhaps that was my error in building it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars While we wait for lego
reviews.reviewText: At the time of writing its still only rumored that lego is planning a legend of zelda collaboration. Until then, it's the other building brick companies that have free reign. This set was fun. I enjoyed assembling it and it looks really cool. I'm happy with my purchase and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks amazing and has great opposability
reviews.reviewText: Moves great and looks amazing. Not too difficult of a build either, in my opinion

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice, but fit is not perfect, and kit had some missing pieces.
reviews.reviewText: I like the design, my son loves it, but it couldn't be fully assembled because it was missing a couple pieces. Now it's a 'battle damaged guardian' I guess. Some parts don't quite fit well, a little loose and tend to pop apart, but overall if you sit it on a shelf, it is fine.
